title: InSPAration Signature Spirit Soul and Body Liquid Aromatherapy
description: Buy InSPAration Signature Spirit Soul and Body Liquid Aromatherapy today and save! This enlightening scent speaks to your soul, and consists of anti-aging natural botanical extracts. The spiritual fragrance is made with white peach nectar, sparkling lemon, and a fading aroma of golden amber and warm mahogany wood.
cleaned_text: Roll over image to zoom in Description InSPAration Signature Spirit Soul and Body Liquid Aromatherapy is an enlightening scent that speaks to your soul. This spiritual fragrance is made with white peach nectar, sparkling lemon, and a fading aroma of golden amber and warm mahogany wood. This liquid consists of anti-aging natural botanical extracts, myrrh, and beet with Vitamins C & E; All of which will aid your skin in looking younger and rejuvenated.
